mapper.sql: id, type, userid, anencyid, createtime, updatetime, enabled
mapper.insert: insert into zf_store (id, type, userid, anencyid, createtime, updatetime, enabled) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{anencyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update zf_store
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
anencyid = #{anencyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zf_store set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, anencyid = #{anencyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from zf_store z where z.type = #{0} and z.userid = #{1} and z.anencyid = #{2} and z.enabled =0
select * from zf_store s where s.userid = #{0} and s.type = #{1} and s.enabled =0

SELECT * from zf_agency a
SELECT * from zf_agencyemployee a
WHERE a.id IN (SELECT s.anencyid FROM zf_store s WHERE s.userid = #{0} AND s.type = #{1} AND s.enabled = 0)
